*div1 type="summary"* *p*H. H. League to Austin, December 19, 1829. Asking Austin to obtain for him leave of absence from service in the ayuntamiento. His unpopularity makes it inconvenient to serve.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Town of Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="12-19-1829">Decr 19. 1829.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir My Extreem bad health precludes the possibilitys of my Visiting your *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*as often as my business would require it after weighing the Subject maturely I find it all important for the interest of the *location_mentioned*Community */location_mentioned*to quiet the outrageous Clammer that actually threatens at this moment the Over throw of every thing and as a Step of Self preservation that I should by all means be Released from serveing any longer as a *person_mentioned*Rigedore*/person_mentioned*, it is impossible that my health can ever be restored under my present State of Depressed and mortified feelings, my hopes and prospects are all blasted; and my oppression is beyond the Controll of all the philosiph[y] and fortitude I can Call to my aid my health has actually Sunk, and unless I can produce a Change, the Conseiquences will be fatal to me and that Very Shortly, thare is no laber or fatigue I would not willingly under go for the advancement of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*if my Exertions Could avail, but Such is the Violence of feeling Existing against me at this moment, that any interfearance with the *person_mentioned*publick */person_mentioned*business by me or Even an Idea that I will interfear infuriates them to madness—it is resolved that the next *person_mentioned*Ayuntamiento */person_mentioned*shall not be contaminated with my (Rascally intrigues) as they Say-—, be the conseiquences what they may—, my own Idea is this, the *person_mentioned*Ayuntamiento */person_mentioned*will dispence with my meeting them on account of my bad health and if it is possible for me to obtain Two month leave of Absence from the *person_mentioned*Chief of Department*/person_mentioned*, I wish to take a Trip to *location_mentioned*N. Orleans */location_mentioned*to See if it will not facilitate my recovery, and if the *person_mentioned*Commissioner */person_mentioned*can be prevailed upon to represent my Case to the Government at the Same time it is possible I may obtain a total Exemption, and should I recover my health which I have much reason to doubt I may be useful to the *person_mentioned*publick */person_mentioned*in someother way—, will you have the goodness to lay the case before the *person_mentioned*comissioner */person_mentioned*and do all in your power for me, which I Shall always acknowledge as the gratest of favours.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*H. H. League */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
